<static, readonly> ReplicatedWriteConsistency :number

Replicated write consistency setting for replicated entities.

Type:
  • number
Properties:
Name Type Description
LOCAL number

Updates will only be written to the local replica immediately, and then asynchronously distributed to other replicas in the background.
MAJORITY number

Updates will be written immediately to a majority of replicas, and then asynchronously distributed to remaining replicas in the background.
ALL number

Updates will be written immediately to all replicas.

Type Definitions

GrpcClientLookup

gRPC client lookup, using fully qualified name for service.

Type:
  • Object.<string, (module:kalix.GrpcClientLookup|module:kalix.GrpcClientCreator)>

MetadataValue

A metadata value. Can either be a string or a buffer.

Type:
  • string | Buffer

Serializable

A type that is serializable.

Type:
  • module:kalix.SerializableProtobufMessage | module:kalix.TypedJson | Object | string | number | boolean | Long | Buffer

SerializableProtobufMessage

This is any type that has been returned by the protobufjs Message.create method.

It should have a encode() method on it.

Type:
  • Object

TypedJson

Any type that has a type property on it can be serialized as JSON, with the value of the type property describing the type of the value.

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
type string

The type of the object.
